it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.view

Class VirtualPlayerDashboardsView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.utils.Observable
      • it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.view.VirtualPlayerDashboardsView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer, RemoteObservable, PlayerDashboardsViewInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class VirtualPlayerDashboardsView
extends Observable
implements PlayerDashboardsViewInterface
    Virtual player dashboards view, relays invocations over the network to the actual player dashboards view.
    See Also:
